text: Singapore Blue colour code Downtownline Mrt Station No 31, This station opend 210ct2017... It's Located At Tampines avenue4 near the junction  with Tampines avenue1
Mixed neighborhood of HDB estate and industrial park, compared to newer estates in other heartland areas, less recreational and family-friendly amenities

"Welcome to the heartbeat of convenience and connectivity: Tampines West MRT Station! Nestled in the heart of Tampines, this bustling transport hub seamlessly blends modernity with ease, offering commuters and travelers alike a gateway to the wonders of Singapore.

Step into the sleek, contemporary design of the station, where efficiency meets elegance at every turn. Whether you're embarking on a morning commute or exploring the city's vibrant offerings, Tampines West MRT Station stands ready to whisk you away to your destination with effortless ease.

Conveniently located within walking distance of Tampines Central, the station serves as a gateway to a myriad of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. From bustling malls to quaint cafes and local eateries, the possibilities are endless, promising endless adventures for the curious explorer.

But it's not just about convenience – Tampines West MRT Station is also a gateway to green spaces and outdoor recreation. Take a leisurely stroll through the nearby Bedok Reservoir Park, where lush greenery and tranquil waters offer a welcome respite from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Whether you're a seasoned commuter, a curious traveler, or a local resident seeking new adventures, Tampines West MRT Station is your ticket to exploration and discovery. So hop on board, and let the journey begin!"

The station is surrounded by the residential  area. The buildings are quite old already but you will find many good shops and food centre inside the HDB block;)
The environment is good as it’s quiet and kids friendly when I visit during lunch time:)
